name: Forest Labyrinth
description:
This production is a simple 2D platformer with procedurally generated levels. The main hero of this game is a young native American who got lost in the forest and his main goal is to come back to his home village. 

Information about the controls and in-game mechanics are decribed during gameplay, so you can jump straight into playing. ;)

I've made this game mainly for educational purposes, so it's not perfect. But nevertheless I hope that you enjoy it and will appreciate my efforts for shipping it.
